meanings.definition: Able to be acquired or reached.
meanings.sent1: The toy was obtainable at the store down the street.
meanings.sent2: Finding a parking spot was not always obtainable during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog seemed more obtainable in cartoons.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a famous singer felt as obtainable as touching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is setting obtainable goals and working hard to achieve them.

meanings.sent1: With hard work, good grades are obtainable for every student.
meanings.sent2: The top prize in the contest was obtainable with dedication and skill.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a flying car seemed more obtainable in science fiction movies.
meanings.sent4: His dream of traveling the world felt as obtainable as a walk in the park.
meanings.sent5: Making a delicious cake is obtainable if you follow the recipe carefully.
